text: Río Piedras is a rapid transit station in San Juan agglomeration, Puerto Rico. It is located between Cupey and Universidad on the only line of the Tren Urbano system, in the city of San Juan. The trial service ran in 2004, however, the regular service only started on 6 June 2005. ==Gallery== Río Piedras Estación Tren Urbano en la calle.jpg|Río Piedras entrance to the station ==References== Category:Tren Urbano stations Category:Railway stations in the United States opened in 2004 Category:2004 establishments in Puerto Rico
title: Río Piedras station
